sdk.zoop.one.offline_aadhaar.zoopController

Interface XmlEventListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XmlAssistModeFragment, XmlWebViewFragment

    public interface XmlEventListener
    This interface handles the two specific event from uidai webview in 1. method to handle event after xml file is download 2. method to handle event after OTP is requested successfully through uidai webview

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onRequestOTP(java.lang.String uid, int postCounter)
      This method handles event after OTP is requested successfully through uidai webview
      void onXmlDownloadFinished(java.lang.String shareCode, java.lang.String qtEnv)
      This method handles event after xml file is download successfully

    • Method Detail

      • onXmlDownloadFinished

        void onXmlDownloadFinished(java.lang.String shareCode,
                           java.lang.String qtEnv)
        This method handles event after xml file is download successfully
        Parameters:
        shareCode - password to unlock the xml file
        qtEnv - environment: preprod or prod

      • onRequestOTP

        void onRequestOTP(java.lang.String uid,
                  int postCounter)
        This method handles event after OTP is requested successfully through uidai webview
        Parameters:
        uid - aadhaar number/vid entered on uidai portal
        postCounter - post request counter updated from webview intercept request method
